name: todo-list
description: A simple todolist web app utilizing the web storage api and webpack

scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.setup: npm install --save-dev webpack webpack-cli && npm install --save-dev html-webpack-plugin && npm install --save-dev style-loader css-loader && npm install --save-dev html-loader && npm install --save-dev webpack-dev-server
